shortdesc.ph: Attributes of the video canvas object.

pd.props: native flutter unity cs electron rn

pd.props: ios mac cpp unity electron rn flutter cs

plentry.pd: The rendering mode of the video. See .

plentry.props: native flutter unity cs electron rn

p.props: ios mac cpp unity electron rn flutter cs

pd.p: The mirror mode of the view. See .

ul.li: For the mirror mode of the local video view: If you use a front camera, the SDK enables the mirror mode by default; if you use a rear camera, the SDK disables the mirror mode by default.
For the remote user: The mirror mode is disabled by default.

plentry.pd: The type of the video source. See .
The ID of the video source.

plentry.props: native flutter unity cs electron rn

pd.props: ios mac cpp flutter unity cs electron rn

plentry.pd: Setting mode of the view. See .

Setting mode of the view.
(0): (Default) Replaces a view.
(1): Adds a view.
(2): Deletes a view.
The ID of the media player. You can get the Device ID by calling .
This parameter is required when sourceType is .

(Optional) Display area for the video frame. See . width and height represent the video pixel width and height of the area. The default value is null (width or height is 0), which means that the actual resolution of the video frame is displayed.

plentry.props: cpp flutter unity cs electron rn
plentry.pd: (Optional) Display area of the video frame, see . width and height represent the video pixel width and height of the area. The default value is null (width or height is 0), which means that the actual resolution of the video frame is displayed.

(Optional) Display area of the video frame, see . width and height represent the video pixel width and height of the area. The default value is null (width or height is 0), which means that the actual resolution of the video frame is displayed.

plentry.props: native flutter unity cs electron rn
plentry.pd: The background color of the video canvas in RGBA format. The default value is 0x00000000, which represents completely transparent black.

plentry.props: cpp ios mac unity electron flutter cs

pd.props: cpp ios mac unity electron flutter
pd.p:
(Optional) Whether the receiver enables alpha mask rendering:
: The receiver enables alpha mask rendering.
: (default) The receiver disables alpha mask rendering.

Alpha mask rendering can create images with transparent effects and extract portraits from videos. When used in combination with other methods, you can implement effects such as picture-in-picture and watermarking.

ul.li: This property applies to macOS only.
The receiver can render alpha channel information only when the sender enables alpha transmission.
